dcterms:creator: Yunfan Ye
Renjiao Yi
Zhirui Gao
Chenyang Zhu

dcterms:description: The ABC-NEF dataset comprises 115 CAD models, each accompanied by 50 observed images and ground truth parametric edges. It is used for evaluating 3D edge reconstruction methods.
dcterms:title: ABC-NEF

dcterms:creator: Henrik Aanæs
Rasmus Ramsbøl Jensen
George Vogiatzis
Engin Tola
Anders Bjorholm Dahl
dcterms:description: The DTU dataset provides dense ground-truth point clouds and is used for evaluating multi-view stereo methods. It includes scans of various objects under controlled conditions.
dcterms:title: DTU

dcterms:creator: Julian Straub
Thomas Whelan
Lingni Ma
Yufan Chen
Erik Wijmans
Simon Green
Jakob J Engel
Raul Mur-Artal
Carl Ren
Shobhit Verma
dcterms:description: The Replica dataset is a digital replica of indoor spaces, providing high-quality 3D reconstructions for evaluating scene understanding and reconstruction methods.
dcterms:title: Replica

dcterms:creator: Arno Knapitsch
Jaesik Park
Qian-Yi Zhou
Vladlen Koltun
dcterms:description: The Tanks & Temples dataset benchmarks large-scale scene reconstruction, providing a variety of challenging scenes for evaluating reconstruction algorithms.
dcterms:title: Tanks & Temples
